title: Looking for reliable Gold player to duo with!
body:
Looking for a reliable, tilt free Gold player to help get me over the hurdle of the S1 trolls.   Ive been climbing solidly from S5 to S1 but over the past weeks 70% of my games have had people purposely inting and most recently a streamer troll picking singe adc.  Im just looking for anyone who would like to duo to get out of the S1 hell for end of season Gold rewards.  I play Mid or Top so i am pretty flexible in my roles.  Add me in game 

Cheers!!
